long_description: The NEMO Coda -20 Sleeping Bag is built so you can sleep soundly on cold winter camping trips. It's insulated with lofty 850-fill goose down and has a stretch construction for absolute comfort. 32 oz. of premium 850-fill-power goose down is rated to keep you warm down to about -20degF, making it suitable for winter camping trips and mountaineering adventures. 15-denier shell fabric has a waterproof, breathable coating on the back that combines with a high-quality durable water repellent coating on the face to shed moisture. Zippered Thermo Gills(TM) vent body heat at your core without letting cold air rush in; compared to unzipping the bag, they allow a better means of fine-tuning comfort. Stretch construction at the knees offers room for side sleeping. Internal draft collar seals in heat and blocks out cold. Toester Box(TM) footbox construction reduces cold spots by mapping out areas of high compression to optimize insulation loft. The NEMO Coda -20 Sleeping Bag comes with a compression stuff sack and a cotton storage bag.
short_description: The NEMO Coda -20 Sleeping Bag is built so you can sleep soundly on cold winter camping trips. It's insulated with lofty 850-fill goose down and has a stretch construction for absolute comfort.
